name: Exam Assignment 2021
description:
Use z and / to control the paddles 

Mouse click to move around the balls

Press space to go 'turbo mode'

Hit the bumpers to gain points

Features:

Blackholes

Cinemachine levels

Bonus points

Checkpoints

Multi-balls

Pulsating fish eye mode

extra lives
